title: Attendance sem 1
content: Question to the people who attended the orientation on Wednesday(btech, on the first week I think) do we need 85% attendance for sem 1? Heard from some people that we do.

comments.body:
Ahem ahem , you didn't hear this from me but it's technically 75. Keep it atleast 80 tho 
Im in 2nd year

hi brother which orientation r u talking about r u from cet 3 round

i am by the way from 1 round cet our classes have already started 

the attendance they told for us was 75 not 85 

anyway don't worry it will get worse
for me it is 75 (im in sem5)
I may or may not have had 74 in 2 subjects in sem 2 , rn in sem 3 . Still keep it at 75 plus tho
